title: 02/06/21: Share your plans with other managers
content: Emprez allows you to create plans to create your Schedules & plans. You can now share one or more plans with other managers in a few clicks, without having to enter each plan.Warning: By sharing your plans, the manager with whom you shared them can make changes that will alter your basic plans.Here are the steps to follow:Click on Schedules, then click on Schedules/Planning,Manage Plans (on the right),Then on  the bottom of the page,In the drop-down menu select the user to whom you want to share your plans,Click on  to select all your plans, or on  to do it case by case.Click on Save.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
